name: CARGO 3204
description:
You are a Bare-- a skeleton. In the After Flesh Days, you live in the underworld, where the Gilded come to claim you for their underworld city. You escape your barrel in Cargo Room 3204 with a floating skull and a locked door. Where to go from here...

This game was made for Smooley as a secret santa present! Smooley's prompts were 3204, Skeletons, and Boats! ( https://smooley.itch.io/ )

There are a... few endings:

Caught by the Balcony!

Jump From the Balcony!

Turn Yourself In!

Bare Yourself to the Captain!

Appeal to the Captain's Past!

The Soul Coin!

and finally... Painted Golden! This one is the silly one, please give it a try ; )

Happy Holidays Smooley!
